Package room

Class Room

java.lang.Object
room.Room
public class Room extends Object
Represents a room in the hotel.
Since:
2022-04-17
Version:
1.0
Author:
BRYAN WU JIAHE

  • Field Details

    • roomNumber

      private String roomNumber
      The number of this room. Sets to be "0" as default.

    • roomType

      private Room.RoomType roomType
      The room type of this room.

    • bedType

      private Room.BedType bedType
      The bed type of this room.

    • roomStatus

      private Room.RoomStatus roomStatus
      The status of this room. Sets to be vacant as default.

    • wifiEnabled

      private boolean wifiEnabled
      The boolean variable indicating whether this room is WIFI enabled. Sets to be true as default.

    • smoking

      private boolean smoking
      The boolean variable indicating whether this room is a smoking or non-smoking room. Sets to be false as default.

    • balcony

      private boolean balcony
      The boolean variable indicating whether this room is equipped with a balcony. Sets to be false as default.

    • maxSize

      private int maxSize
      The maximum size of group this room is able to accommodate.
